original: Liberg, Lars Herman Bernhard (Berndt), ingenjör, Göteborg, f. 3/7/ 8b i Husby-Rekarne, Södermani. 1., av disp. Johan Bernhard L. o. Hilda Katarina Maria (Majken) Anneli. G. 26 m. Ingrid Holmberg. Barn: Urban f. 28. — Mog-:ex. i Upps. 03, elev v. Falu bergssk. 04-05, v. bergshögsk. 06-07. f)raktik o. stud. i Tyskl. o. USA 10-12 s. kommerskollegii o. Jern-kontorets stip. Undering. v. Hellefors Bruks A-B martin- o. valsverk i Hällefors 08-10, förste ing. v. bolagets masugnar, martin- o. valsverk 12-17, ing. f. Christiania Spigerverk v. igångsättn. av martin- o. valsverk 18, ing. v. Björneborgs Järnverks A-B 19-24, numera förest, f. A-B Elektrolux kylavd. i Gbg. Medl. av Gbgs friv. motorbåtsflottilj sed. 40.
translated: Liberg, Lars Herman Bernhard (Berndt), engineer, Gothenburg, b. 3/7/8b in Husby-Rekarne, Södermanland. 1st child of disp. Johan Bernhard L. and Hilda Katarina Maria (Majken) Anneli. Married in 1926 to Ingrid Holmberg. Children: Urban, b. 1928. Graduated from Uppsala University in 1903, student at Falun Mining School 1904-1905, at Bergshögskolan 1906-1907. Practical work and studies in Germany and the USA 1910-1912, with scholarships from the Chamber of Commerce and the Iron Office. Trainee at Hellefors Bruks A-B, co-factory and rolling mill in Hällefors, 1908-1910, chief engineer of the company's blast furnaces, co-factory and rolling mill 1912-1917, engineer at Christiania Spigerverk for the establishment of a co-factory and rolling mill in 1918, engineer at Björneborgs Järnverks A-B 1919-1924, currently manager of A-B Elektrolux refrigeration department in Gothenburg. Member of the Gothenburg Volunteer Motorboat Flotilla since 1940.

work.name: Hellefors Bruks A-B
work.department: Blast Furnaces, Co-factory and Rolling Mill
